titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the King & Queen, at White-hall the 12th of November, 1693 : being the day appointed for a publick thanksgiving to Almighty God, for the gracious preservation of His Majesty, and his safe return / by John, Lord Archbishop of York.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, 1645-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
